item.title: BumFighter 2.0 [SRL]
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

Can I just say the script looks very good, but without setting The Player Array you will get Runtime Errors, and your Antirandoms probably won’t work. You Don’t need to use all the PlayerArray but instead of using UserName Password you need to Use player[0] for the randoms to work Player[0].Nick has to be set to 3 or 4 letters of the username because thats how our FindTalk works. Just afew tips to make you a better scripter We Also have 3 execellent Player Array forms that are quite easy to use, my personal favorite is PlayerForm.Scar just include

{.include srl\srl\misc\playerform.scar}

and add

SetUpPlayers somewhere in the begining of your script after setupsrl and before loginplayer.
Also i highly suggest adding

NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars); // Screenname for FIRST Player in case of already loggedin.

in the setup of your script after setuplayers to create the nickname for the first player incase he was started logged in…

Read full topic

item.title: BumFighter 2.0 [SRL]
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

its ok… also why did you give me credit, i didnt do that much for my name to be next to yours :D[br][size=1]Posted at: May 06, 2006, 02:37:05 pm[/size][hr]Bumis, heres Arrow Pickup Too, if you want to add it in

Procedure CollectArrows; Var F, F2 : Integer; Begin; If(FindColorSpiral(X, Y, 395004, 546, 6, 738, 156))Then Begin MMouse(X+(4), Y+(4), 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(100+Random(200)); Flag; Wait(100+Random(300)); Repeat If(FindObj3(X, Y, 'Take', 537173, 10))Then Begin MMouse(X, Y, 4, 4); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, False); End Else If(FindObj3(X, Y, 'Take', 857195, 10))Then Begin MMouse(X, Y, 4, 4); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, False); End; Wait(250); If(ClickOption('Take', 1))Then Begin Flag; Repeat Wait(100); F := F+1; Until(F >= 50)Or(GetColor(575, 237) = 857195)And(GetColor(588, 230) = 5925); End; F2 := F2+1; Until(F2 >= 5)Or(GetColor(575, 237) = 857195)And(GetColor(588, 230) = 5925); End; End;[br][size=1]Posted at: May 06, 2006, 02:40:55 pm[/size][hr]
This Will Equip The Arrows

Procedure EquipArrows; Begin; If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(X, Y, 857195, 565, 209, 601, 250, 10))Then Begin MMouse(X, Y, 2, 2); Wait(100+Random(100)); GetMousePos(X, Y); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(400+Random(300)); End; End; [br][size=1]Posted at: May 06, 2006, 02:42:07 pm[/size][hr]This Will Take Breaks

Procedure TakeBreak; Var TimeTo : Integer; Begin; TimeTo:= Random(6); If(TimeTo = 0)Then Begin Logout; Status('5 Minute break'); Wait(300000+Random(120000)); BreakTime := 0; Login; End Else If(TimeTo = 1)Then Begin Logout; Status('10 Minute break'); Wait(600000+Random(150000)); BreakTime := 0; Login; End Else If(TimeTo = 2)Then Begin Logout; Status('20 Minute break'); Wait(1200000+Random(300000)); BreakTime := 0; Login; End Else If(TimeTo = 3)Then Begin Logout; Status('30 Minute break'); Wait(1800000+Random(600000)); BreakTime := 0; Login; End Else If(TimeTo = 4)Then Begin Logout; Status('45 Minute break'); Wait(2700000+Random(750000)); BreakTime := 0; Login; End Else If(TimeTo = 5)Then Begin Logout; Status('One hour break'); Wait(3600000+Random(900000)); BreakTime := 0; Login; End; End;[br][size=1]Posted at: May 06, 2006, 02:42:51 pm[/size][hr]If You Want To Add A Mage Option. Here You Go!

Procedure SetMagicMode; Begin; If(RadioButton3.Checked)Then Begin GameTab(1); Wait(100+Random(300)); MMouse(710, 411, 6, 6); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Repeat Wait(300); Until(Not(GetColor(636, 357) = 65535)); If(Spell = 'Wind Strike')Then Begin MMouse(585, 225, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Water Strike')Then Begin MMouse(622, 223, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Earth Strike')Then Begin MMouse(664, 223, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Fire Strike')Then Begin MMouse(704, 224, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Wind Wave')Then Begin MMouse(580, 348, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Water Wave')Then Begin MMouse(620, 348, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Earth Wave')Then Begin MMouse(662, 348, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Fire Wave')Then Begin MMouse(701, 348, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Wind Bolt')Then Begin MMouse(581, 265, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Water Bolt')Then Begin MMouse(621, 265, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Earth Bolt')Then Begin MMouse(662, 265, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Fire Bolt')Then Begin MMouse(701, 265, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Wind Blast')Then Begin MMouse(581, 307, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Water Blast')Then Begin MMouse(621, 307, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Earth Blast')Then Begin MMouse(662, 307, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End Else If(Spell = 'Fire Blast')Then Begin MMouse(701, 307, 3, 3); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Wait(200+Random(100)); End; Repeat Wait(300); Until(GetColor(636, 357) = 65535); MMouse(581+Random(40), 430+Random(8), 4, 4); GetMousePos(X, Y); Wait(100+Random(100)); ClickHuman(X, Y, True); Repeat Wait(200); Until(GetColor(609, 437) = 1777020); End; End;[br][size=1]Posted at: May 06, 2006, 02:45:02 pm[/size][hr]Bumis I Hope You Find this Code Helpful

item.title: BumFighter 2.0 [SRL]
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

for the heal id suggest using health percentage!
something like :

[code]{This Finds The Food Color}
Procedure GetFoodColour;
Begin;
GameTab(4);
Wait(200+Random(100));
MMouse(628, 374, 4, 4);
Wait(100+Random(100));
GetMousePos(X, Y);
If(IsUpText(‘Eat’))Then
Begin
FoodColour := GetColor(X, Y);
End Else
Begin
MMouse(663, 224, 6, 6);
GetMousePos(X, Y);
Wait(100+Random(100));
If(IsUpText(‘Eat’))Then
FoodColour := GetColor(X, Y);
End;
End;

{This Eats the Food with the Colour already Saved}
Procedure Munch;
Begin;
GameTab(2);
CurrentHpLvl := GetSkillAmount(‘HitPoints’);
If(CurrentHpLvl < EatHp)Then
Begin
GameTab(4);
Wait(100+Random(300));
MMouse(21+Random(400), 50+Random(400), 6, 6);
Wait(100+Random(450));
If(FindColorSpiral(X, Y, FoodColour, 553, 207, 737, 460))Then
Begin
MMouse(X, Y, 4, 4);
Wait(100+Random(100));
ClickHuman(X, Y, True);
End Else
Begin
WriteLn(‘Oh Noes! Run out of food!!’);
RandomChat;
LogOut;
End;
End;
End;[/code]

NOTE: its For SRL and it also finds the food colour automatically

PS My Names Ollie

Read full topic

item.title: BumFighter 2.0 [SRL]
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

looks really nice.

Couple of Tips:
Use LoginIFNeeded in SRL - Its a lot better to use.
Try using all of SRL’s features, such as multiple accounting
You can use GetHP (I think) in SRL to return the exact amount if HP the char has, so its a lot easier to autoheal

Nice job!

Star

Read full topic

item.title: BumFighter 2.0 [SRL]
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

Olle/Radeon took my script, and he added Random Events, but removed alot of my code, such as my AutoHeal, it’s back and much better.

[b]New Features:

  1. Anti-Randoms: Thanks to SRL & Ollie
  2. Universal Healing: Pick your food and when to heal easily!.
  3. Super speed from BumFighter 1.2 and Ollie’s update. About 5x Faster!!!
  4. Improved ban protection.

4: Removed the random right/left click, and made it always left. Goes faster.[/b]

This is a fully functional AutoFighter now. I think the next step will be adding forms, to make it alot cleaner.

Enjoy, I stayed up all night writing this nubs.

//////////////////////////////////////////////////
//               BumiSRL Fighter 2.0            //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////
//    BumFighter 1.1, Edited by Ollie/Radeon.   //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////
//               Setup On Line 23               //
//               ////////\\\\\\\\               //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////
program RADFighter;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar}
var
ABCase1,ABCase2,FightMode: Integer;
ABMouse,Fighting,AutoLogin: Boolean;
Color1,Color2,Color3,tol: Integer;
HPCount: Integer;
user,pass:string;
stop,DoSomethingWeird: Integer;
P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7,HealWhen,FoodColor: Integer;
UseFood: Boolean;

Procedure Setup;
begin
{ User Setup}
User:='username';
Pass:='password';
FightMode:=1;
AutoLogin:=true;
{ Monster Setup }
Color1:=7028284;        // Color Of Monster1 Here
Color2:=5517358;        // Color Of Monster2 Here
Color3:=3940898;        // Color Of Monster3 Here
tol:=10;                // Tolerance to find the monster color. 10 is default
{ Food Setup }
UseFood:=False
FoodColor:=000000002
HealWhen:=4             //2=20HP, 3=30HP,4=40HP ect

End;

procedure FindRandoms;
begin
  RotateEvery(1+random(5))
  FindNormalRandoms;
  ClickToContinue;
  CloseWindow;
  FindLamp('mining');
  FindDead;
  FindMod;
  FindMime;
  FindMaze;
  FindQuiz;
  FindFrog;
  FindDoctor;
  FindDemon;
  if Findname Then FindTalk;
end;

Procedure OpenFriends;
Begin
 Mouse(584,485,5,5,true)
 Wait(300+random(300))
End;

Procedure AntiBan1;
Begin
 ABMouse:=True
 Status('AntiBan Activated!')
 ABCase1:=Random(5)
 ABCase1:=Random(5)
 Case ABCase1 Of
  1:
   Begin
    MMouse(586,310,21,21)
    Wait(100+Random(100))
    MMouse(246,98,40,40)
    Wait(100+Random(100))
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  2:
   Begin
    Status('Checking Stats!')
    Mouse(586,184,7,7,true)
    Wait(20+Random(20))
    GetMousePos(x,y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,2)
    Wait(125+Random(125))
    GetMousePos(x,y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,4)
    Wait(1000+Random(1000))
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  3:
   Begin
    MMouse(600,276,20,12)
    Wait(45+Random(25))
    MMouse(616,283,12,17)
    Wait(45+Random(25))
    MMouse(614,423,12,17)
    Wait(190+Random(225))
    Mouse(559,186,7,7,True)
    Wait(500+Random(500))
    GetMousePos(X,Y)
    Wait(20+Random(5))
    MMouse(x,y,2,6)
    Mouse(584,187,2,2,true)
    Wait(1000+random(200))
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  4:
   Begin
    CMMouse(585,187,5,5)
    Wait(1+random(20))
    GetMousePos(x,y)
    Mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
    Wait(120+random(120))
    CMMouse(588,265,20,20)
    Wait(2000+random(1000))
   End;
 End;
End;

Procedure AntiBan2;
Begin
 ABCase2:=Random(9)
 ABCase2:=Random(9)
 Case ABCase2 Of
  1:
   Begin
    MMouse(266,175,250,160)
    Wait(300+Random(50))
    MMouse(266,175,250,160)
    Wait(300+Random(50))
    MMouse(266,175,250,160)
    Wait(300+Random(50))
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  2:
   Begin
    MMouse(266,175,250,160)
    Wait(800+Random(50))
    MMouse(266,175,250,160)
    Wait(50+Random(50))
    OpenFriends;
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  3:
   Begin
    Wait(2000+Random(1200))
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  4:
   Begin
    MMouse(327,199,300,180)
    Wait(400+Random(400))
    MMouse(327,199,300,180)
    Wait(75+Random(400))
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  5:
   Begin
    MMouse(327,199,300,180)
    Wait(400+Random(400))
    MMouse(327,199,300,180)
    Wait(400+Random(400))
    MMouse(327,199,300,180)
    Wait(400+Random(400))
    MMouse(327,199,300,180)
    MMouse(327,199,300,180)
    Wait(400+Random(400))
    DoSomeThingWeird:=Random(4)
     Case DoSomeThingWeird Of
       1:
        Begin
         OpenFriends;
        End;
       2:
        begin
        end
       3:
        begin
        end
       4:
        begin
        end;
      End;
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  6:
   Begin
    GetMousePos(X,Y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,2)
    GetMousePos(X,Y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,2)
    Wait(25+Random(20))
    GetMousePos(X,Y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,2)
    Wait(25+Random(20))
    FindRandoms;
   End;
  7:
   Begin
    GetMousePos(X,Y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,2)
    Wait(105+Random(20))
    GetMousePos(X,Y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,2)
    GetMousePos(X,Y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,2)
    Wait(200+Random(22))
    GetMousePos(X,Y)
    MMouse(x,y,2,2)
    Wait(200+Random(22))
    FindRandoms;
   End;
 End;
End;

Procedure RenameScar;
begin
DisguiseScar('iTunes');
end;

Procedure FindFoe;
begin
If FindColorTolerance(x,y,Color1,0,0,511,330,tol) or
   FindColorTolerance(x,y,Color2,0,0,511,330,tol) or
   FindColorTolerance(x,y,Color3,0,0,511,330,tol) then
   Begin
    MMouse(x,y,1,1)
    Wait(20+random(20))
    If IsTextInAreaEx(4,4,55,24,x,y,'Attack',100,UpChars,True,false,0,1,14475232) then
     Begin
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      Mouse(x,y,0,1,true)
      GetMousePos(X,Y)
      wait(2000+random(500))
      GetMousePos(X,Y)
     End;
   End;
If not FindColorTolerance(x,y,Color1,0,0,511,330,tol) or
     FindColorTolerance(x,y,Color2,0,0,511,330,tol) or
     FindColorTolerance(x,y,Color3,0,0,511,330,tol) then
 Begin
  Wait(50+random(20))
 End;
end;

Procedure Heal;
Begin
 Writeln('')
 Writeln('--- Eating')
 Writeln('')
 Mouse(648,183,3,3,true)
 Wait(700+Random(200))
 If FindColorTolerance(x,y,FoodColor,555,209,743,466,10) then
  Begin
   Wait(25+random(20))
   MMouse(x,y,5,5)
   Wait(100+Random(200))
   If IsTextInAreaEx(0,0,30,22,x,y,'Eat',100,UpChars,True,false,0,1,15198183) then
    Begin
     GetMousePos(x,y)
     MMouse(x,y,1,1)
     Mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
    End
  End;
 If not FindColorTolerance(x,y,FoodColor,555,209,743,466,10) then
  Begin
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('--- Out Of Food... Signing off!')
   Writeln('')
   Wait(15000+random(5000))
   Mouse(646,480,5,5,true)
   Wait(500+random(500))
   Mouse(646,373,3,3,true)
   Wait(5000+random(2000))
   Mouse(646,480,5,5,true)
   Wait(500+random(500))
   Mouse(646,373,3,3,true)
   Wait(160000+Random(160000))
   Stop:=1
  End;
End;

Procedure LookAtHP;
begin
If Not FindColorTolerance(x,y,2763390,574,172,598,195,10) then
 Begin
  Mouse(586,186,6,6,true)
  wait(1000+random(200))
 End;
 if (FindBitmapMaskTolerance(P2,x,y,645,206,660,225,10,240))then
  begin
   Status('HP: 20s...')
   If HealWhen=2 Then
    Begin
     Heal;
    End;
  end;
 if (FindBitmapMaskTolerance(p3,x,y,645,206,660,225,10,240))then
  begin
   Status('HP: 30s...')
   if HealWhen=3 Then
    Begin
     Heal;
     End;
  end;
  if (FindBitmapMaskTolerance(p4,x,y,645,206,660,225,10,240))then
  begin
   Status('HP: 40s...')
   if HealWhen=4 Then
    Begin
     Heal;
     End;
  end;
 if (FindBitmapMaskTolerance(p5,x,y,645,206,660,225,10,240))then
  begin
   Status('HP: 50s...')
   if HealWhen=5 Then
    Begin
     Heal;
     End;
  end;
 if (FindBitmapMaskTolerance(p6,x,y,645,206,660,225,10,240))then
  begin
   if HealWhen=6 Then
    Begin
     Heal;
     End;
  end;
  if (FindBitmapMaskTolerance(p7,x,y,645,206,660,225,10,240))then
  begin
   if HealWhen=7 Then
    Begin
     Heal;
     End;
  end;
end;

Procedure Engine;
Begin
HPCount:=HPCOUNT+1
If HPCount=3+Random(3) Then
 Begin
  If UseFood=True Then
   Begin
    Writeln('looking at hp')
    HPCount:=0
    LookAtHP;
   End;
 End;
  Repeat
   Wait(20+Random(20))
   If FindColorTolerance(x,y,65280,0,0,508,330,10) Then
    Begin
     Fighting:=True;
    End
   If Not FindColorTolerance(x,y,65280,0,0,508,330,10) Then
    Begin
     Fighting:=False;
    End
   If Fighting=False Then
    Begin
     FindFoe;
    End;
   If Fighting=True Then
    Begin
     AntiBan2;
    End;
  Until(False);
End;

Procedure SetFighting;
Begin
 Mouse(559,177,7,7,True)
 Wait(500+Random(1000))
  Case FightMode Of
   1:
    Begin
     Status('FightMode = 1')
     Mouse(598,285,10,10,true)
     Wait(1000+Random(1000))
    End;
   2:
    Begin
     Status('FightMode = 2')
     Mouse(600,325,10,10,true)
     Wait(1000+Random(1000))
    End;
   3:
    Begin
     Status('FightMode = 3')
     Mouse(597,366,10,10,true)
     Wait(1000+Random(1000))
    End;
   4:
    Begin
     Status('FightMode = 4')
     Mouse(600,406,10,10,true)
     Wait(1000+Random(1000))
    End;
  End;
End;



 Procedure Login;
 Var
  ClickHereToPlay, Tx, Ty, C : Integer;
 Begin;
 if(AutoLogin)then
   ClickHereToPlay := BitmapFromString(29, 2, 'z78DA7373230C0C' +
     'C0C0CCD4D0C0C014971A73376323232333274367034B08896902A' +
     '60804983A1A9A1A58E03219228B693BB209585C8BC30DC800EA5A' +
     'BCFE4251EF6A6460688AE95A2C2683CD040002BE5286');
   If(Not(LoggedIn))Then
    Begin
      Wait(1000);
      ClickOption('Cancel', 1);
      ClickOption('Exist', 1);
      If(ClickOption('Username', 1))Then
        Begin
          TypeSend(''+User+'');
          Wait(100 + Random(100));
          Mouse(327, 272, 0, 0, True);
          TypeSend(''+Pass+'');
          Wait(100 + Random(100));
        End;
      ClickOption('Login', 1);
      MarkTime(Mark);
      Repeat
       Wait(100);
      Until(Not(FindText(Tx, ty, 'onnect', UpChars, 240, 200, 530, 240)))Or(TimeFromMark(Mark) > 20000);
      Repeat
       Wait(1000);
      Until(FindBitmapToleranceIn(ClickHereToPlay, X, Y, 380, 290, 620, 380, 20));
      Wait(1000 + Random(500));
      Mouse(x, y, 20, 2, True);
      Repeat
       Wait(1000);
       C := C+1;
      Until(LoggedIn)Or(C >= 600);
    End;
  FreeBitmap(ClickHereToPlay);
 End;
 
Procedure Images;
begin
 P1 := BitmapFromString(3, 8,
       '000000FFFFFF000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000FFFFFF000000' +
       '000000FFFFFF000000000000FFFFFF000000000000FFFFFF000000' +
       '000000FFFFFF000000FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF');
 P2 := BitmapFromString(5, 8,
       '000000FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF000000FFFFFF000000000000000000' +
       'FFFFFF000000000000000000000000FFFFFF000000000000000000' +
       'FFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFF' +
       '000000000000000000FFFFFF000000000000000000000000FFFFFF' +
       'FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF');
 P3 := BitmapFromString(4, 8,
       '000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000FFFFFF000000000000FFFFFF000000' +
       '000000000000FFFFFF000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000000000' +
       '000000FFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000' +
       'FFFFFF000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000');
 P4 := BitmapFromString(4, 8,
       'FFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFF' +
       '000000000000000000FFFFFF000000FFFFFF000000FFFFFF000000' +
       'FFFFFF000000FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000FFFFFF' +
       '000000000000000000FFFFFF000000');
 P5 := BitmapFromString(4, 8,
       'FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFF' +
       '000000000000000000FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000000000' +
       '000000FFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000' +
       'FFFFFF000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000'); {Image for 5 in stats}
 P6 := BitmapFromString(5, 8,
       '000000000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000FFFFFF000000000000' +
       'FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000000000000000FFFFFF000000FFFFFF' +
       'FFFFFF000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000' +
       '000000000000FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFF000000' +
       'FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF000000');       {Image for 6 in stats}
 P7 := BitmapFromString(4, 8,
       'FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFF000000' +
       '000000FFFFFF000000000000000000FFFFFF000000000000FFFFFF' +
       '000000000000000000FFFFFF000000000000FFFFFF000000000000' +
       '000000FFFFFF000000000000000000');  {Image for 7 in stats}
end;


begin
{ MAIN Stuff Here }
  Writeln('')
  Writeln('BumSRL Fighter 2.0')
  Writeln('')
  Images;
  Setup;
  SetupSRL;
  RenameScar;
  Login;
  SetChat('Off', 1);
  SetChat('Off', 2);
  SetChat('Off', 3);
  SetFighting;
  Engine;
end.
repeat
 FindRandoms;
 wait(300+random(150));
 Engine;
until(stop:=1
end.
